name: defguard
description: DefGuard is a modern identity and access management tool for managing WireGuard VPN networks through an intuitive web UI. It includes user management, SSO integrations, and easy provisioning for secure remote access.
features: WireGuard Management: Intuitive UI for managing VPN networks. Simplified VPN administration.
User Provisioning: Easy onboarding with automated config generation. Streamlined access management.
SSO Integration: Connect with existing identity providers. Centralized authentication.
Access Control: Fine-grained permissions and policies. Secure network access.
Modern Interface: Clean, responsive web UI. Manage VPN from anywhere.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your VPN infrastructure. Privacy-first remote access.
